instructions: Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 1 1 Open Telegram. It's the light-blue app with a white paper airplane in the middle, usually located on your home screen. Log in with your phone number if you aren't logged in automatically. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 2 2 Tap the search bar at the top. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 3 3 Type tchannelsbot into search. Search results will filter as you type. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 4 4 Tap the "Telegram Channels Bot" result. If you typed the search term correctly, it will be the only result at the top. It's the channel with the username "@tchannelsbot" under the title. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 5 5 Tap . It's at the bottom of the screen. If you don't see this option, you can type /start into the message bar at the bottom, then press the blue "send" arrow above the keyboard. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 6 6 Tap an option. You can tap any of the buttons that appear, such as: Top Chart : displays the most popular channels. Recent : displays a list of recently created channels. By Category : displays all the channel categories. Search : lets you search for channels. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 7 7 Open a Channel. Find a channel you want to join, then tap the link listed for the channel. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 8 8 Tap . It's at the bottom of the channel. You are now a member of the channel. Advertisement

Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 9 1 Open a web browser. Open Safari, Google Chrome, or any mobile web browser you prefer on your iPhone. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 10 2 Go to a telegram channel directory site. You can search "Telegram channel list" or something similar on Google, or visit the following Telegram channel lists. https://tlgrm.eu/channels Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 11 3 Search for a topic that interests you. Many Telegram channel directory sites have categories such as gaming, movies, television, etc. Most websites that list Telegram channels have a search bar as well. Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 12 4 Open the channel. Choose a channel and then: Tap ( https://tchannels.me ). Tap ( https://tlgrm.eu/channels ). Image titled Find Telegram Channels on iPhone or iPad Step 13 5 Tap . It's at the bottom of the Telegram channel. You are now a member of that channel. Advertisement

1 Open a web browser. Open a web browser that is most comfortable for you. Image titled Search Website Step 1 2 Go to a website that allows you to browse through open channels, groups and messages in Telegram. You can use this link: https://search.buzz.im/ Image titled Website Search Step 2 3 Type keywords for your desired theme. It works just like any search engine. For example, if you want to find food-related channels and groups, use search bar and type "food", or "recipes for dinner", or "best breakfast", etc. Image titled Website Search Step 3 4 Open the channel. Choose a channel you like and tap on its name. It will automatically open in Telegram app on your phone. Image titled Website Search Step 4 5 Tap . You can find this button at the bottom of your screen. Now you are subscribed to this channel. Advertisement
